meanings.definition: A person who represents a brand or company in advertising or promotional materials.
meanings.sent1: The spokesmodels smiled brightly in the commercial.
meanings.sent2: The spokesmodels appeared on billboards across the city.
meanings.sent3: The spokesmodels joked around on set during the photo shoot.
meanings.sent4: The spokesmodels were like walking advertisements for the company.
meanings.sent5: The spokesmodels stood out with their professional demeanor.

meanings.definition: The individuals who serve as the public face of a company or organization.
meanings.sent1: At the event, the spokesmodels greeted guests warmly.
meanings.sent2: The spokesmodels attended the charity gala on behalf of the company.
meanings.sent3: During the interview, the spokesmodels shared funny anecdotes.
meanings.sent4: The spokesmodels were the friendly faces that everyone recognized.
meanings.sent5: The spokesmodels exuded confidence in representing the brand.

meanings.definition: Models who are hired to promote products or services through various marketing channels.
meanings.sent1: The spokesmodels showcased the new line of cosmetics on TV.
meanings.sent2: Companies often choose spokesmodels to endorse their latest products.
meanings.sent3: The spokesmodels made the product launch event more exciting.
meanings.sent4: In the ad campaign, the spokesmodels brought the products to life.
meanings.sent5: The spokesmodels were the key to boosting sales for the company.
